name: Deepwater Nourishing Lip Mask with Sea Moss and Aloe Stem Cells
about: What it is: A daily, nourishing & antioxidant-rich lip mask with Sea Moss & Hibiscus to replenish moisture levels for visibly soft, supple, and hydrated lips...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture..Formulation: Balm..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Hibiscus Extract: A natural source of malic acid to soften skin and fight free radicals..- Aloe Stem Cells: Soothe visible redness and irritation and nourish for soft-feeling lips..- Sea Moss: A nutrient-rich seaweed that hydrates, supports, and protects skin...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This ultra-soothing, non-sticky, and moisture-replenishing lip mask penetrates lips, leaving them soft and supple. The formula is infused with antioxidant-rich hibiscus, soothing aloe stem cells, and skin-supporting sea moss. Plus, it’s formulated with a delicious vanilla, brown sugar flavor.
ingredients: -Hibiscus Extract: A natural source of malic acid to soften skin and fight free radicals.  .-Aloe Stem Cells: Soothe visible redness and irritation and nourish for soft-feeling lips. .-Sea Moss: A nutrient-rich seaweed that hydrates, supports, and protects skin...Polybutene, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Diisostearyl Malate, Dipentaerythrityl Tetrahydroxystearate/Tetraisostearate, Synthetic Beeswax, Glyceryl Behenate/Eicosadioate, Synthetic Wax, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Silica Silylate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Vanillin, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Isostearyl Alcohol, Boron Nitride, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Calendula Officinalis Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Malic Acid, Water/Aqua/Eau, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Panthenol, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Tocopherol, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Hydrolyzed Chondrus Crispus Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract, Citric Acid....
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- Apply evenly to clean lips. .- This lip mask can be used daily or overnight for hydrated, pillow-soft lips by morning. .- For your juiciest lips year-round, use our Isle Lip Balm SPF 30 during the day for sun protection and this Deepwater Lip Mask at night as a moisture replenishing lip treatment. .- Store at room temperature....Recycling Instructions:.-This bottle is made of 30 percent post-consumer recycled plastic. .-Clean out the jar prior to placing in your home recycling bin along with the cap..-All of CAY SKIN’s secondary cartons are made from 100 percent FSC-certified paperboard. Place them in your home recycling bin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this lip mask. I use this everyday I love the smooth feel on my lip and how hydrating I leaves my lips. I live in a place where it’s freezing in the winter I love how the mask coats my lips. This is my third one I love how amazing this smells

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this mask every night for two months and every morning I wake up to extremely dry lips.

reviews.review_title: THE BEST LIP MASK BY FAR
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best lip mask ever and I have tried them all! It stays on and really heals my lips. Feels so great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s thick but really refreshing and perfect for an over night mask. Smells delicious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought at first it was just me having an allergic reaction till I had my sister try it and she had the same experience! lips would burn edges would turn red and all around My lips became so irritated and dried out I looked like a clown walking  around with my lips were burnt all around them. so bad. and that 2 of us had the same reaction doesn't isolate my own allergic reaction took me weeks to heal my lips and I had tried again but as soon as I felt the itch and tingle it was an absolutely not touching it again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Ebony skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This made my lips so dry and irritable. I don't know what the ingredient is, that I'm allergic too but this was an absolute NO GO!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this on sale. It's not as hydrating as with other brands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It Burns, not just a little, it burns quite a bit.  I have never been more disappointed in a skin care product or customer service.  After calling and telling the agent how it reacted she basically told me if I read the reviews I would have known that it burns some people.  I couldn't help but laugh as I went in store looking for something to help my chapped lips and was told by the consultant this was the go to product.  So, I naively purchased it.  Before calling this morning I did get someone else to try it and it burned her lips as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like the smell but the formula dries really quick after applied and leaves my lips even more dry than they were before.  I'll be sticking with Laniege.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is so moisturizing. It feels so nice, and you get so much product for the price. It also smells really good! It has a subtle vanilla scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it, but it burns half the time I put it on.  Won’t buy again due to the discomfort the application sometimes gives.

reviews.review_title: A definite part of my nighttime routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know if the formula was changed or what, but I don’t get any burning or tingling when using it.  I’ve been using it for weeks and I love how soft it makes my lips feel. Only complaint is the scent can be a little intense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s Perfect. I’ve tried the laniege lip mask, la mer’s lip balm, the og glossier balm dot com, the farmacy lip mask, summer friday’s lip balm, the dior lip glow balms, fresh’s lip balm (sticks and in the pot), the nuxe lip balm… the list goes on.  And this is the ONE. The quantity of product is great for the price, and it truly hydrates and keeps your lips soft. My lips normally either get used to a balm and stay dry underneath, more chapped than before. It’s perfect.

reviews.review_title: Great product but packaging need improvement
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just as I experienced with other products with this brand: the product is wonderful but the packaging is terrible. As someone with autoimmune issues, I struggle to open this up. I would purchase again, but only if they make the packaging more accessible

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent! It's a tie between this one and the Laniege lip mask. I have one next to my bed to apply at night. I've tried a ton of sleeping lip masks & this one is at the top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a replacement for the discontinued Mamonde Lip Sleeping Mask due to the similarity in the main ingredients. The Cay Skin lip mask is clear and has a nice soft vanilla fragrance. It works well as a sleeping mask and keeps lips from drying out overnight. My only complaint is it’s a little bit sticky, but overall I am happy with it.

reviews.review_title: Love! Have multiples around the house!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a super buttery and hydrating formula. It is thick but not too thick and it seems to provide a great hydration barrier. It’s not messy and it doesn’t bleed outside the lip lines like others.

reviews.review_title: Best lip mask I have used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loooove this lip mask! it feels so smooth, isn't sticky at all, and has just a bit of shine that makes me wear it in the day as well as for bed. I even bought one for my niece as well. It looks like some people who talk about it stinging have an allergy to soke ingredient in it, but I sure don't. There is no sting with this product whatsoever for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First the packaging is nothing fancy. It has a vanilla like scent. The balm is very smooth not sticky. I use it at night and during the day and my lips stay hydrated and smooth. The price point is good, wish it came with spoon to scoop out product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Ebony skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First buy due to Jackie Ania with similar issues on the lips so far I don't regret

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this, but had a weird reaction to it. My tongue and throat got kind of tingly/scratchy after using it, and it didn't leave my lips any softer or more moisturized - if anything they were more chapped in the morning! It does smell amazing, but unfortunately that's about the only positive thing I can say about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just love this lip mask! I have been using the Laneige lip masks for years and I recently saw an influencer talking about this product, so I wanted to give it a try. I still love my Laneige, but now I also love this one. The Cay Skin lip mask has no smell or flavor to it. It is very nourishing and feels good on the lips. It is also thicker just like the Laneige one, but this one has a little more slip to it. It is also long lasting. I use these lip masks during the day also, so they are very versatile for me. Cay Skin, please make this lip mask with some scents and flavors also. Sometimes I love to have some fruity lippies on me. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. My lips feel hydrated and not feathered.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! It smells so good and the texture is perfect for a lip mask. It makes my lips so shiny and nourished. I prefer this over the laniege and the fenty! It’s a large amount for the price too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The absolute best. I use this religiously at bedtime and in the morning, and my lips have never looked or felt better. This got me through the winter months with no dryness! Super moisturizing, smells lovely, and lasts a long time. Imi will repurchase over and over.

reviews.review_title: Moisturizing but caused throat to itch.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A Sephora employee recommended this when I was returning the Tatcha lip mask. The lip mask is moisturizing and lasted well on the lips. The only problem is that I am getting a tickle in my throat when using it.  likely

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product from Cay skin customer service as their lip balm applicator broke. After using for about a week my lips were incredibly dried out and irritated. Unfortunately won't be buying from this brand any more, but still love Winnie :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best lip mask ever! It got me through over a year-long course of accutane where my lips were so incredibly dry. Smells lovely too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best Lip Mask ever. I replaced Laneige with this. It very nourishing and price point if great with VIB sale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I try almost every lip mask and this one will be my new cult favorite. I hope this stays in stock forever. Smells divine, feels divine! This mask actually sinks into your lips rather than sit on top like most of them do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! If you love vaseline for your lips but want a higher end version of it that lasts longer and smell better, this is it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use this every night before bed and love the texture! It keeps my lips so moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love everything I’ve tried from this brand.  I switched from the La Neige lip mask because I wanted something with cleaner ingredients and I’m so happy I did.  Great cushiony texture,  and the vanilla scent is lovely.  I’m usually not a fan of vanilla but this is luxurious.  If you’re thinking about it,  just buy it you won’t regret it.

reviews.review_title: Nice texture and scent, but burned my lips
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the vanilla smell..it’s not an insanely sweet cakey vanilla, it’s just sweet enough.  The consistency of this product is perfect. I can’t speak to how long this lasts on this lips, though, because I unfortunately had to return this item. I put this on my lips one time and it burned worse than a bad sunburn. I always check labels and did check this label before I purchased, so I didn’t see anything that was even mildly suspicious to me. When I returned the item, the sales associate immediately said it’s probably the sea moss. I have no idea if that’s the issue or not, just a heads up to anyone else who may be trying this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Lip Mask is my go to!!! it has been added to my skin care for life!. like the moment my lips are chapped i put this on and i feel it tingling which to me is a sign that it's working. By the end of my day my lips go back to normal. Lastly, the scent is very lite no too strong and it smells so good. I wish her lotions had that same smell. Just live the vanilla scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the formula, feels a lot like the summer Friday lip butter but in a pot. Last a good time in between uses and really great as a prep before any lipsticks. A permanent addition to my kit!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a lip balm junkie and love the output of this product.  Kinda wish there was another delivery method like a no touch tube or stick but you can’t beat the moisture and shine.

reviews.review_title: You won’t regret purchasing this one!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to admit..I am a major lip mask junkie.  I am often disappointed in one’s that I purchase, but not this one by CAY SKIN.  I LOVE IT!  It does tingle a bit once you apply it, but it is extremely nourishing and hydrating.  You won’t regret this purchase!

reviews.review_title: My search for lip rescue continues!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is nice but not great… and if it’s $30 for a lip mask it better be great. I’ve used this consistently for like 2 weeks and my lips are still chapped, flaking and dry. I was hoping for much more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is great! It’s very moisturizing and it helps chunk off all the dead skin on my lips. I’m very picky with lip products because my lips are beyond clinically dry. I’ll definitely purchase this. It’s so much better than I had expected it to be! Pleasantly surprised!

reviews.review_title: Luxurious consistency, amazing taste and flavor!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely review products but I had to get on and write about this product. I recently bought a ton of lip moisturizers and this is my hands-down favorite. The consistency is rich and smooth, the scent and flavor is amazing. It is for sure a luxurious product. I read others are mentioning a burning sensation, I’ve not experienced any of that. I’m pleased with the generous amount. If I had to pick one thing, I wish this came in a tube with an applicator similar to the SPF one. I want to take this with me on the go all day long but I don’t want the container to get nasty. I also got the SPF lip moisturizer, the two are a bit different. The SPF one doesn’t taste quite as good as the lip mask.With all that said, this is still a 5 star product and is worth every penny. I will definitely be buying some more of this! I’d like to add that no one asked me to write this review.

I've been using this lip mask for about a year.  It's so hydrating and is not sticky.  I love it and have repurchased multiple times.  I even use it during the day and it's comfortable to wear.  I love the light vanilla scent,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! It’s a must have for the winter! Love the smell and super hydrating. Would love to see a tinted version of this!!

reviews.review_title: A staple part of my night time routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this lip mask at night for the past few months and I am not disappointed. What I love most is the thick consistency as the moisture last for hours, and I always wake up with super soft lips. The scent also gives off a delicious vanilla aroma. I can’t wait to purchase again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I consider myself a very picky lip balm lover. Lip balm is personal (like mascara). I own practically every lip product that promises moisture, etc. and this one is TOP TIER. Perfect tingle, perfect consistency, and Beautiful smell. I hope this continues to be made because it's amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Believe the reviews that say this burns. BURNS. I didn’t have any visible reaction, but wow this stuff is awful. I tried to stick it out and kept wearing it for a couple weeks to see if anything would change, but it just made my lips peel. You can find way better products at a similar price point. The only good thing I have to say is that it smells nice, but that is not a selling point for a twenty two dollar lip mask. Absolutely do not waste your money on this garbage. Just because it’s listed as a “clean” product doesn’t mean it’s good for you. Avoid this one.

reviews.review_title: Not one good thing to say..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I cant think of one good thing to say about this lip mask. The worst part is the very strong burning sensation.. not a tingle.. it burns!

reviews.review_title: A must if you have dry chapped lips. Holy Grail!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Finally a product that really moisturizes & heals my chapped lips. I’ve used so many lip treatments & none compare to this. After one use my dry cracked lips were healed. Only complaint is I went thru it in 3 weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip mask I use this daily. I carry an entire bag of lip products that I rotate through all day long and this is a must it doesn’t have a bitter aftertaste. It looks great on the lips and does a wonderful job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I REALLY wanted to love this.  The texture is amazing and it’s thick and feels like it would be soothing.  No!  It burned on my lips each time I used it and 2 ingredients in it are not good to have in/on the body

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The only lip balm that stops my lips cracking and bleeding in the winter. I've tried literally everything else. I put it on at night and in the morning, and I never have problems. It's also deeply pleasant to use. The texture is thick but not smothering, the smell is mild and comforting, and it looks lush, like gloss. The tub lasted about six months, including winter. Worth every penny and then some. I found it much better than laneige's masks, which are fine if you're not particularly dehydrated, but tend to melt and disappear. I woke up with this on, if I didn't accidentally touch it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love, Love this Lip Balm. I live in the desert and my lips have never felt this soft and moist

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Three words: Buttery. Soft. Lips. I had been using the Bite beauty lip nighttime agave mask for so long. The company is no longer in business and I had ran out so I did some research to find  something that had similar skincare ingredients but also the luscious feel it gives your lips. This Cay Skin lip mask is it but even better I might dsay??? I I use it at night and even after washing my face in the morning my lips still feel so soft and hydrated throughout the day. So glad I bought it and I think you will be too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip mask. Nice scent. Perfect texture. Leaves your lips incredibly soft and a little goes a LONG way. Love love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried the lip gloss, body sped, oil and face spf. I’ve liked them all except the mask. I’ve never had sensitivities to lip products but after about 5 days my lips burned Nd tingled . I had to stop using it as it hurt yo put it on .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is truly amazing I’ve tried a lot of lip balms lip oils  from every high low mid brands every thing I don’t drink alot of water I’m always dehydrated with the worst lips I put this on omg I can’t explain it run don’t walk to get it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff has literally saved my poor lips. I have post acutane lips (they have never recovered from when I took it 8 years ago) and I thought I would forever have to deal with dry lips. This stuff feels heavenly - plus it smells amazing

reviews.review_title: Quickly becoming a staple in my beauty routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After finding out that Winnie Harlow was the face behind Cay Skin…I had to buy more to try it out. I’ve been using the Isle Glow Face Moisturizer for a year now and love it (buy it) so I decided to give the lip mask a try. Let me tell you, I am a Laniege Lip Mask fan all day; but this…THIS, is quickly becoming my favorite! It’s moisturizing, not sticky, stays on all night, and has a very pleasant sweet fragrance to it. Try it, I think you’ll love it too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much! It’s a permanent lip staple for me now 🥰 not to mention go to gift! Thick, creamy, and it smells like a warm summer day at the beach!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This will replace my OG Bite Agave lip mask. So far, I have not experienced any lip allergies...I'm happy. My only complaint is the pot packaging. I don't like using my fingers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m hitting pan and finally reviewing. Had I reviewed this right after I bought it I would have given it 3 stars because it didn’t have any flavor. But throughout the winter I found myself grabbing this every time. 5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip treatment ever! I have used and tried about every lip treatment out there and have about 8 different brands currently. I keep them everywhere so I always have one close. This one is the bomb! Ilove

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this as my only lip product for several days now and my lips feel great! It stays on all night also and has a great mellow flavor/smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t usually write reviews but this lip mask is honestly the best! I had been using the Laneige lip mask for years and after reading the reviews I decided to try this one out, & I’m so glad I did!

reviews.review_title: ALL I CAN SAY IS WOW!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: THIS IS THE BEST LIP MASK I’VE EVER TRIED! I’M ABSOLUTELY OBSESSED! The formula is so silky smooth and ultra hydrating. It has the same addicting vanilla & brown sugar smell/taste like the lip balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love using this balm, it works well and smells so good!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I instantly fell I love with this mask and I have tried them all. I saw some other reviews that spoke about the smell..but mine has a light vanilla scent and it just feels sooooo creamy and plush on the skin.    masks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm almost done with my first jar and I love this. It keeps my lips soft when applied multiple times daily and revives them after a long day. Sometimes it tingles when I apply it and sometimes it doesn't. I haven't noticed that my lips get dry from long term use. Overall, I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It burns and dries lips out overtime. It smells good and feels nice but it chaps your lips.

reviews.review_title: Great lip mask. Soft & remove dead skins
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never heard of this brand until I purchased this lip mask. I have been applying this every night when i go to bed. I have very easy to dry lips, this mask helps me remove all the dead skins on my lips. It helps to keep my lips moust and soft all day. I really enjoy this product and might purchase again when i run out. But it’s been lasting for few months and i still have half left. So little goes long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells good and does what it says. Definitely really moisturizing, my lips haven’t been chapped since I got this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my lips feel so moisturized and soft! One of the best hydrating treatments I’ve used!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a part of Laneige cult-following, this is hands down better! Love the smell, the texture is dreamy. Goes on pillowy smooth, lasts through the night, not sticky at all & WORKS!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the consistency and feels great on my lips. I’ve tried a lot of lip masks and this has been my favorite by far. I would buy this again and again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried a lot of lip masks and this one so far is my favorite. It’s not too thick or sticky and leaves your lips feeling soft. I actually love the vanilla scent and find that it has great staying power. I would say if you want to treat yourself to a nice lip mask choose this one, but if you want something cheaper honestly Vaseline isn’t too far off from this product as far as consistency

reviews.review_title: There are better lip masks out there
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this lip mask during the last Sephora sale and have been trying it for a few months before leaving a review. PROS: Great texture. Not sticky. Amount of product in container lasts a long time. CONS: Highly fragranced.  Causes breakouts around lips. Does not last through the night. I am unsure if it is the large amount of fragrance but this product left my lips more dry and peeling than before I started. I would love to see a fragrance free version of this product or even a version in a squeezable tube to be more hygienic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Ebony skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Literally the best lip mask I have tried  and there has been plenty. This is definitely better than Laneige for sure! Now my go-to bed time mask!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells wonderful and it leaves my lips feeling so hydrated. I used to be an avid Lanegie Lip Mask girly but since trying this, I’m never goi bc back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product wasn’t very hydrating. Within an hour my lips felt really dry/chapped again and this is without eating or drinking. It’s just ok at best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Literally the BEST lip mask/balm. It makes my lips sooo soft and moisturized…smells amazing. I will repurchase a million times.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the first time I knew it was going to be a must have in my collection. The formula is great for the winter time. Mask is on the thicker side, but works wonders. Keeps my lips moisturized for so long throughout the day. Lips feels soft and smooth long after the mask is applied. Definitely will be repurchasing. Love applying this at night and in the morning

reviews.review_title: Better then ANY lip mask out there!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Probably the best lip mask in the game! From the texture to the scent, everything about this product is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love it, it keeps my lips plump. I use it in the morning and at night. I also use it during the day when I go out because it’s winter and regular chapsticks doesn’t help me.

reviews.review_title: I still prefer Laneige Sleeping Mask.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this product, but unfortunately, it's been just a bit meh. Because it's been cold, I really have to warm up the product to get it to spread -- it ends up being pretty solid. When I've used it overnight, I just haven't felt like my lips were as moisturized as when I use the Laneige Sleeping Mask. Won't repurchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Genuinely works better than any balm I've used but the smell is overbearing. It smells like fake vanilla and brown sugar which does not fade. If you are sensitive to scents skip this.
I use this everyday! The moisture is amazing and the longetivity is so similar to the laneige mask, which definitely stays on longer than most other lip products. The smell, brown sugar, is amazing!

reviews.review_title: Did What No Other Lip Balm Could
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip mask is amazing. It cured my incurably chapped lips. Mine have been chapped and painful for weeks, if not months. I've tried other expensive lip balms, Aquaphor, etc. but as soon as those wore off, my lips would shrivel back up. I was starting to wonder if I needed to see a derm or if lip filler would be my only option. I impulse bought this and my lips were significantly better overnight. Now it's been three days, and they're completely back to normal. Even when the balm wears off, they're hydrated. Sometimes it stings a tiny bit. I don't know why and honestly, I don't care. Please never change the formula! I want to buy this forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip mask i've used in a while, it's very thick, the ingredients are great and plump and hydrate the lips, but most of all it's the exact texture i'm looking for!

reviews.review_title: I don’t get the great reviews
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip mask did nothing but smells good. If feels very sticky and thick on the lips kinda like you’ve rubbed caramel sauce on your lips. It’s not sticky at all but a very uncomfortable feeling and I still haven’t noticed any difference even after weeks of use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has really helped my dry chapped lips. So happy I bought this. Love the smell as well. Highly recommend for anyone who lives in a harsh winter climate like me. Bought the lip balm with the SPF for day time use in the summer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow..this is the absolute best lip treatment i have ever used .and ive used a lot..smells delicious,and stays on a long time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: You can stop searching-this is the one boo! I was surprised at how soft and plump my lips felt- no peeling no sticky greasy feeling , just right.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Initially i really liked this and made my lips feel hydrated. After a week of consistent use my lips felt stripped and had a sensitive burning sensation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mask and I’ve tried everything!!!! 5 stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this lip mask. My lips get so dry in the winter months. This mask keeps my lips moisturized all night and then put it on in the morning and it locks the moisture in for several hours in the morning. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the lip mask of my dreams. I put it on before bed and again in the morning before work, and it both lasts and delivers remarkable results. However, I am removing one star because it REEKS. The fragrance (like the strongest of vanilla cake scents) is probably acceptable for most people, but I am very sensitive to scents and flavors in lip products and this gave me a migraine the first time I tried it. The formula is totally worth it,  and I don't get headaches if I use a small amount; I just wish it came in other scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is as good as gold for chapped lips. I’m so glad I found this product. I intend on hoarding it for the winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the one. No more to say! ...but I will, because that alone wouldn't have sold me lol. I am absolutely in love with the way this makes my lips look and feel! I have soft, non-peeling, supple, and hydrated lips all day long. The consistency is utter perfection. It's not sticky...it kind of melts when you touch it, like coconut oil, but slightly thicker. If you've ever tried lanolips, it's similar, just not as thick. The smell is very light. Like you're back sugar cookies, but at a distance. Simply delicious lips. Cay Skin has done it right. Seriously, you can stop looking right here. Let them take your money!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ohhhh yes mamm! this lip mask! is it !🔥 goes on smooth and my lips were soft!i love it!🧡

reviews.review_title: LIP BALM MORE LIKE LIP BOMB YASSS
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My lips have been dry due to medical reasons and this cold weather was not helping. They were chapped, cracked, and a mess. I tried several lip balms and oils. This was like a last resort type of deal.   OMG no regrets. I am not a fan of the vanilla smell, but this one is so faint. I applied it on my lips and my lips were like,  Thank you . It made my lips so soft and hydrated. Cracked and chapped lips, where?!?!  I like to apply this before lipsticks, it makes the application a lot smoother. This has basically become my go to lip balm. I can wear it under a mask and it does not get all crusty or sticky.   For the price and the amount it is not too bad. There are more expensive lips masks, this is pretty good. I will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ll go ahead and say what many people won’t admit: This stuff is better than Laneige. The finish is super hydrating and silky without being excessively sticky. Laneige is popular, but if you’re really looking for something to truly address the issue of dry lips, I’d highly recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Cay Skin lip balm and absolutely loved it so thought I'd give this a try. I love this even more. You get a decent size tub for the price, it's not sticky at all, product is thick and nourishing and melts right into my lips. The smell is also a plus! I even put a little bit on my hands to keep them soft and hydrated overnight. Woke up and still had some product on my lips. This is the best lip product I have ever used. Also note, I'm not an influencer and wasn't given a sample. Just noting that b/c I feel like almost all reviews you read aren't real anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lip mask that actually works! I been using alot of products on the market but nothing seems to work. Was going to give up on lip masks and just use lip blams but once I tried this I could really feel this product working on my lips. Been using it for the last month and it goes with me everywhere. Its nice to know this is made with good ingredients such as aloe stem and sea moss. The packaging is super cool and sleek. Will have to grab some for my friends for the holidays - can't have my friends experience dry lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I noticed instant results after the first application. The hydrating formula just melts into my lips without leaving any sticky residue. I use less lip balm throughout my day too. Very impressed with the hydration. It's the best lip mask I have ever used!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for a couple of weeks and I really like it! It's thick and hydrating, but not super sticky. It usually absorbs a bit into my lips after applying (they get really dry this time of year!). I've started putting it on after my morning skin care routine too - I am pretty picky about lip masks/moisturizers, so I would say this is a win!

reviews.review_title: Good for winter and dry lips
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This instantly helped my dry lips, it made my lips super smooth and it smells amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s so hard to find lip products that actually moisturize the lips instead of just sitting on top and this does a great job. It’s the perfect consistency and the scent is so warm and comforting. Sinks in quickly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am OBSESSSSSED with this lip mask. My lips are always chapped and nothing seems to help. I typically use just plain aquaphor and for a while liked the laneige lip sleeping mask. This is so much better. First of all, it smells amazing. Second, it doesn't leave any gross residue which I felt like other lip masks did. I used it before bed and woke up with moisturized lips and continue to use it a little throughout the day because it has such a nice glossy look. Love love love this, so happy to have it in time for winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this lip mask! With the weather changes my lips have been feeling super dehydrated and this mask has brought them back to life. Will be buying again and again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product has helped my lips retain moisture. I use it at night and I wake up with hydrated lips. It’s also perfect for an everyday makeup look since it has an amazing glossy finish

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you're on the fence about buying this product here's your sign to do it! I put this on before bed and wake up with moisturized lips in the morning. It smells delicious just like the Isle lip balm which I also highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I went from La Neige to Grande Pout and this one beats both lip masks. Butterry, effective, sublime. No overpowering coconut thank God!!! Mostly a vanilla scent which I love. I am thrilled to have discovered it and to use it. A must buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this product! It smells AMAZING and it keeps my lips hydrated through the night so I wake up with them feeling softer! It’s definitely a staple in my night time routine now!

reviews.review_title: best lip mask for long lasting moisture!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this mask! I like to keep a lip balm or mask in my bathroom cabinet so I can use it during my morning and nighttime skincare routine, and this is perfect for that. It makes my lips so soft and moisturized, and it stays on for so long! It's perfect for the cold winter months and even stays on underneath my face masks. I definitely recommend, this will be a staple in my skincare routine for a long time.

reviews.review_title: Going to need one in every purse!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a big lip mask buff and this just shot all the way to the top of my list. My lips feel soft and healthy! Its lightweight and leaves the perfect subtle shine. It actually makes my lips feel like they got a facial lol! Going to need like 5 more to get me through winter. Love this product.
Lip masks are theeee best and I'm really liking this one. It's thick and smells really good. I use it every night and my lips are soft af

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this!! I use this at night and wake up to very hydrated lips or during the day under lip gloss. A little goes a long way. No drying or cracking and it smells great!
I've been trying several lip masks lately, and this one is definitely the softest and best smelling. I use it at night and wake up with the softest lips. Def a new favorite

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in love! I grew up using unconventional products to try and moisturize my lips. I'm so happy to have found this clean product that actually moisturizes (and the moisture LASTS). It's light and the scent is calming.  its like the pre-game to the party that is the isle lip balm. Definitely replacing my Leneige, which I didn't think was possible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first Lip Mask I've ever tried that actually works. I originally planned to use at as an overnight mask but my lips were so plump & hydrated the morning after I first used it that I started using it during the day. Love that it actually stays on the lips throughout the night and doesn't dry out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this lip mask wayyyy better than laneige. I just LOVE the scent. I know it says vanilla/brown sugar. but honestly i smell a hint of coconut as well and i’m obsessed. my lips feel super nourished and hydrated. i am loving the consistency of the product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I live in a dryer climate and the lip mask has helped my lips stay moisturized - its worth it!

reviews.review_title: If you don’t know, Now you know!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always suffered from dry/cracked lips no matter the weather. I tried other products and to be honest some work, but NONE of them work as well or feel as light as Cay. This is a MUST HAVE. No gimmicks just results. I can only speak for myself but  I will never use another product again. This is THE ONE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is exactly what I was looking for. So rich and makes my lips smooth and moisturize. I highly recommend this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product definitely recommend love everything from cayskin wish they had more products on sephora

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG! This lip mask! I have to say I’m a huge lover of lip balm, masks and glosses but this mask truly makes your lips feel nourished, hydrated and soft. A must buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The headline says it all! I’ve been using Laneige until someone recently recommended this lip mask to me. I tend to have issues finding the best of the best for my lips, but my search ends here! I have had no complaints since the purchase. My lips feel great with absolutely no need to constantly reapply the mask like some other brands out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has replacement my favorite lip mask! It's extremely moisturizing and long lasting. I'm surprised how good it is!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not wowed. It’s great but didn’t wow me. It didn’t stay on the whole night. Smelled great though. Just felt kinda goopy to me. Just wasn’t for me.
